rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious living area that serves as the central hub for daily activities. Designed following Vastu principles by placing the seating area towards the east to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A quiet and private space with an attached ensuite bathroom. The master bedroom is oriented southward, ensuring peaceful rest according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A versatile guest room that can also be used as a study. Positioned on the north side for balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Serves the master bedroom, with fixtures and layout designed keeping functionality and Vastu in mind.

openings.description: Main entrance aligning with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy, ensuring a smooth flow of air and light.
Large windows providing ample natural lighting while maintaining privacy. The orientation ensures balanced solar exposure.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: A private outdoor space with minimalistic furniture and greenery, designed for relaxation and social gatherings. This terrace is oriented east to capture the morning sun.

additional_features.name: Large Garden
additional_features.description: A well landscaped garden with native plants and water features, creating a serene environment in line with Vastu. The garden is centrally located to balance the energy of the villa.
